GitHub profile

I am since November 2018 a PhD student in Statistics at LPSM, Sorbonne Université, under the supervision of Gérard Biau and Benoît Cadre.

Research

I am interested in applications of rough paths theory to statistical learning.

Preprints

  • Fermanian, A. (2019). Embedding and learning with signatures. Code available here.

  • Master thesis (2018)
